comment:
Single infusion mash.
Target mash temperature: 152F
Hold mash: 45 mins.
Wort size: 6.5 gals.
Boil time: 60 mins.
At sugar at 10 mins
Whirlpool and rest knockout hops in hot wort for 30 mins.
Chill wort to 68F.
Ferment at 68F for 7 days.
Rack to dry hop for additional 4-7 at 55-57F.
Adapted from BYO Magazine.
